title: friend chat log bug
body:
Hi, 

This happened since the new patch. 

When I'm talking to a friend on the message tab, our chat does not show in the order that we typed it. I would type something and when they reply their message appears above mine..and then it gets confusing after multiple replies because it's all over the place!

I've tried repair tool at login screen and it didn't fix it. Any help? Thanks.

replies.body: My time zone is correct and it synced with times.windows.com today already. And it's not my friend because this happens with every friend I chat with :( thanks though

Hey man,

Sounds to me like your (or your friends) systems clock might be out of wack, could you try making sure your system clock is set to the correct timezone and then sync that with an Internet Time Server, there's a good guide [here](http://www.guidingtech.com/3119/windows-clock-sync/) on how to achieve that.

Let me know if this helps, thanks.
